actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of persons who suffered damages as a result of the sonic boom tests over Oklahoma City, Oklahoma in 1964.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction on the United States District Courts and the U.S. Court of Claims to hear, determine and render judgment upon the claims of any person arising out of the sonic boom tests conducted over Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, in 1964 for the Federal Aviation Administration. Specifies the issues upon which such cases shall be decided, including: (1) whether the sonic boom tests caused the damages claimed; and (2) the amount of those damages.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of persons who suffered damages as a result of the sonic boom tests over Oklahoma City, Oklahoma in 1964.
